results.title: Effects of third-generation beta-blockers, atenolol or amlodipine on blood pressure variability and target organ damage in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@Carvedilol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ were more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in the prevention of @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, and cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Collagen_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003095 @@@and aortic collagen deposit@@@.

citations.NLM: Del Mauro JS, Prince PD, Allo MA, Santander Plantamura Y, Morettón MA, González GE, Bertera FM, Carranza A, Gorzalczany SB, Chiappetta DA, Morales C, Gelpi RJ, Taira CA, Polizio AH, Donato M, Höcht C. Effects of third-generation beta-blockers, atenolol or amlodipine on blood pressure variability and target organ damage in spontaneously hypertensive rats. J Hypertens. 2020 Mar;38(3):536-545. PMID: 32028517
citations.BibTeX: @article{32028517, title={Effects of third-generation beta-blockers, atenolol or amlodipine on blood pressure variability and target organ damage in spontaneously hypertensive rats.}, author={Del Mauro JS and Prince PD and Allo MA and Santander Plantamura Y and Morettón MA and González GE and Bertera FM and Carranza A and Gorzalczany SB and Chiappetta DA and Morales C and Gelpi RJ and Taira CA and Polizio AH and Donato M and Höcht C}, journal={J Hypertens}, volume={38}, number={3}, pages={536-545}}

results.title: Effects of ACE inhibition and beta-blockade on collagen remodelling in the heart of Bio 14.6 hamsters.
results.text_hl: These results reveal that @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ produced similar beneficial effects on @<m>DISEASE_Collagen_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003095 @@@collagen remodelling@@@ in Bio @CELLLINE_CVCL:C4UP @@@14.6@@@ @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@ by decreasing the total amount of collagen, and also by changing collagen phenotypes through the inhibition of the @GENE_REN @GENE_101842518 @@@renin@@@-angiotensin system.

citations.NLM: Mansoor AM, Honda M, Kuramochi T, Tanaka K, Morioka S, Takabatake T. Effects of ACE inhibition and beta-blockade on collagen remodelling in the heart of Bio 14.6 hamsters. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol. 1996 Jan;23(1):43-9. PMID: 8713495
citations.BibTeX: @article{8713495, title={Effects of ACE inhibition and beta-blockade on collagen remodelling in the heart of Bio 14.6 hamsters.}, author={Mansoor AM and Honda M and Kuramochi T and Tanaka K and Morioka S and Takabatake T}, journal={Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={43-9}}

results.title: Attenuation of hypertension-mediated glomerulosclerosis in conjunction with increased angiotensin (1-7).
results.text_hl: While both @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ attenuated @DISEASE_Perivascular_Epithelioid_Cell_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D054973 @@@renal perivascular collagen deposition@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Collagen_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003095 @@@PVCD@@@), the greatest effect was observed in SHRs receiving @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@.

citations.NLM: Igase M, Yokoyama H, Ferrario CM. Attenuation of hypertension-mediated glomerulosclerosis in conjunction with increased angiotensin (1-7). Ther Adv Cardiovasc Dis. 2011 Dec;5(6):297-304. PMID: 22089474
citations.BibTeX: @article{22089474, title={Attenuation of hypertension-mediated glomerulosclerosis in conjunction with increased angiotensin (1-7).}, author={Igase M and Yokoyama H and Ferrario CM}, journal={Ther Adv Cardiovasc Dis}, volume={5}, number={6}, pages={297-304}}
